description: Returns information about one integration between CloudWatch Logs and OpenSearch Service.

parameters.name: integrationName
parameters.description: The name of the integration that you want to find information about. To find the name of your integration, use ListIntegrations.

nested_items.name: integrationName
nested_items.description: The name of the integration.

nested_items.name: integrationType
nested_items.description: The type of integration. Integrations with OpenSearch Service have the type OPENSEARCH.

nested_items.name: integrationStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of this integration.

nested_items.name: integrationDetails
nested_items.description: A structure that contains information about the integration configuration. For an integration with OpenSearch Service, this includes information about OpenSearch Service resources such as the collection, the workspace, and policies.

nested_items.name: openSearchIntegrationDetails
nested_items.description: This structure contains complete information about one integration between CloudWatch Logs and OpenSearch Service.

nested_items.name: dataSource
nested_items.description: This structure contains information about the OpenSearch Service data source used for this integration. This data source was created as part of the integration setup. An OpenSearch Service data source defines the source and destination for OpenSearch Service queries. It includes the role required to execute queries and write to collections.

nested_items.name: dataSourceName
nested_items.description: The name of the OpenSearch Service data source.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of this resource.

nested_items.name: statusMessage
nested_items.description: A message with additional information about the status of this resource.

nested_items.name: application
nested_items.description: This structure contains information about the OpenSearch Service application used for this integration. An OpenSearch Service application is the web application that was created by the integration with CloudWatch Logs. It hosts the vended logs dashboards.

nested_items.name: applicationEndpoint
nested_items.description: The endpoint of the application.

nested_items.name: applicationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the application.

nested_items.name: applicationId
nested_items.description: The ID of the application.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of this resource.

nested_items.name: statusMessage
nested_items.description: A message with additional information about the status of this resource.

nested_items.name: collection
nested_items.description: This structure contains information about the OpenSearch Service collection used for this integration. This collection was created as part of the integration setup. An OpenSearch Service collection is a logical grouping of one or more indexes that represent an analytics workload. For more information, see Creating and managing OpenSearch Service Serverless collections.

nested_items.name: collectionEndpoint
nested_items.description: The endpoint of the collection.

nested_items.name: collectionArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the collection.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of this resource.

nested_items.name: statusMessage
nested_items.description: A message with additional information about the status of this resource.

nested_items.name: workspace
nested_items.description: This structure contains information about the OpenSearch Service workspace used for this integration. An OpenSearch Service workspace is the collection of dashboards along with other OpenSearch Service tools. This workspace was created automatically as part of the integration setup. For more information, see Centralized OpenSearch user interface (Dashboards) with OpenSearch Service.

nested_items.name: workspaceId
nested_items.description: The ID of this workspace.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of this resource.

nested_items.name: statusMessage
nested_items.description: A message with additional information about the status of this resource.

nested_items.name: encryptionPolicy
nested_items.description: This structure contains information about the OpenSearch Service encryption policy used for this integration. The encryption policy was created automatically when you created the integration. For more information, see Encryption policies in the OpenSearch Service Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: policyName
nested_items.description: The name of the encryption policy.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of this resource.

nested_items.name: statusMessage
nested_items.description: A message with additional information about the status of this resource.

nested_items.name: networkPolicy
nested_items.description: This structure contains information about the OpenSearch Service network policy used for this integration. The network policy assigns network access settings to collections. For more information, see Network policies in the OpenSearch Service Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: policyName
nested_items.description: The name of the network policy.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of this resource.

nested_items.name: statusMessage
nested_items.description: A message with additional information about the status of this resource.

nested_items.name: accessPolicy
nested_items.description: This structure contains information about the OpenSearch Service data access policy used for this integration. The access policy defines the access controls for the collection. This data access policy was automatically created as part of the integration setup. For more information about OpenSearch Service data access policies, see Data access control for Amazon OpenSearch Serverless in the OpenSearch Service Developer Guide.

nested_items.name: policyName
nested_items.description: The name of the data access policy.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of this resource.

nested_items.name: statusMessage
nested_items.description: A message with additional information about the status of this resource.

nested_items.name: lifecyclePolicy
nested_items.description: This structure contains information about the OpenSearch Service data lifecycle policy used for this integration. The lifecycle policy determines the lifespan of the data in the collection. It was automatically created as part of the integration setup.

nested_items.name: policyName
nested_items.description: The name of the lifecycle policy.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of this resource.

nested_items.name: statusMessage
nested_items.description: A message with additional information about the status of this resource.
